song_name: When I Go Out, I Want To Go Out On A Chariot Of Fire
lyrics:
16 contributorswhen i go out i want to go out on a chariot of fire lyricsintro
he had a plan to kill you all along
the evidence was hidden in this song
i was a ghost i was there at the scene
as the embers rise my hands smelled like gasoline

verse 2
so the head lights murdered my thoughts
i curse this taste thats on my tongue this taste will last until i rip it out
no i wont need these gloves
her bones are withered away but her ghost will remain

prechorus
youre the only one that wore your seatbelt were the only ones that cried
catastrophic accident youre the only one that died

chorus
so keep my casket closed
your heart beats under the floor
it haunts me in my dreams
and nothings as it seems

postchorus
hallelujah whoa

verse 3
so just believe in me ill never let you down
this was a curse i can say as you lie in your grave
you might also likeprechorus
youre the only one that wore your seatbelt were the only ones that cried
catastrophic accident youre the only one that died

chorus
so keep my casket closed
your heart beats under the floor
it haunts me in my dreams
and nothings as it seems

refrain
but her ghost will remain as you lie in your grave
but her ghost will remain as you lie in your grave

bridge
all the choices youve made and the paths that i take
youre the only one that died the evidence was hidden in this song
all the choices youve made and the paths that i take
were the only ones that cried irrelevant i knew it all along
all the choices youve made and the paths that i take
it was never enough it was never enough it was never enough now was it
